# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by many of our customers. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $180. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that is worth more than $150 to us, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in purchasing it. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
